Cerberus/NightBlade:

     "Once Dachande returns we can begin an assult on
Magmatron," Cerberus told NightBlade in his cave.
"Heck, why don't we start now? [opens comm to
Dachande] Hey! We're gonna go and start fighting
Magmatron, come and help as soon as you're done."
     NightBlade quickly assembles a weapon, "Ready to
fight."
     Cerberus and NightBlade quickly head towards the
Destron base, Sulaco, to take down Magmatron. But
unknown to them, Magmatron knew their plans...


Magmatron:

     "Blast!" Halucigen could hear him too. "Excuse me
for a moment."
     He disconnected with his drone and set his
autoguns. "Guiledart, get your device ready, we have a
few visitors coming, and I want them on my side."
     "Destrons, leave the Sulaco and find a place to
hide near it," Magmatron said. "The puppies are coming
to play..."
